limitacoes.associadas.string: Limitations associated with the following areas of adaptive skills:

linkdin.invalido.string: Insert a valid LinkedIn Profile URL

msgDeclaracaoRacial.string: VAGAS.com believes in equal rights and opportunities for all people. For this reason, we are collecting information on the candidates' racial self-declaration, according to the IBGE's identifications and terminologies.

msgModalInclusaop1.string: VAGAS.com believes in equal rights and opportunities for all people. For this reason, we are collecting information on the candidates' racial self-declaration.

msgModalInclusaop2.string: Only companies that sign a term of commitment to inclusion will be able to use the self-declaration of race.

msgModalInclusaop3.string: According to IBGE (2016) more than 54% of the population declares itself to be black or mulatto. However, in the labor market there is clear inequality, since blacks and mulattos are 63.9% of the unemployed (PNAD Continuous Quarterly, May 2019) and represent, disproportionately, only 5% of executive positions in the 500 largest companies in Brazil (Institutes Ethos, 2015).
